objects.name: AS_GSS_INT_POST_fetchDocumentFromExternalSource
objects.description: Supporting Integration to achieve single click download of external documents. Converts the fetched document from response of " AS GSS WA POST Fetch Document From External Source" to appian value

objects.name: AS GSS WA GET Browser Download Link From External Source
objects.description:
Supporting API to achieve single click download of document retrieved from external system. 
This api is to return the fetched document fetched by "AS_GSS_INT_POST_fetchDocumentFromExternalSource" as http response
